idea: Pardus is India's first LiDAR based camera trap sensor company that aims at producing affordable products. Goal is to make wildlife camera trapping technology accessible to everyone, strengthening wildlife research and promoting wildlife photography using Indian technology.
name: Pardus Cameratrap Solutions

idea: We Desi TV is the name of a TV channel i want to start. This channel is supposed to fill the gap in the business. We know the young generation prefers to watch OTT instead of TV. Many say that there is nothing for a young class audience on Indian Television. And to fill this gap there isn't any channel that is serving this needs. We need shows which can relate to the OTT class audience and also the masses in some degree. There is a generation of audience who wants to watch shows like 'The Big Bang Theory' or 'Breaking Bad'. I want to start a channel which provides them with all this awesomeness of storytelling.
name: We Desi TV

idea: I had started my entrepreneurial journey in the year 2017 by partnering with a German company for developing & selling the products of the brand 720°DGREE in the Indian Market. Prior to this, I was working for a NBFC and also have gained some experience in the hospitality sector.
name: Chinmay

idea: Our company primary business is into the Global Advertising Agencies industry includes advertising campaigns and place the advertisements in periodicals, newspapers, radio, TV and other media. The emergence of new media and, in particular, the trend toward more digital services has prompted a fundamental change in advertising strategies. Some industry operators specialize in online advertising as a way of adapting to these changes, leading to an influx of smaller niche companies
name: CWW SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: At Swamee PR, your growth is our mission and Communication is at the core of what we do. Our head office is located in Mumbai, India through which we supports clients in more than 200 cities PAN India. Our team's biggest strength is our innovative integrated communication approach (environment scanning, research & analytics, perception mapping, strategic image output, media relations & advocacy, crisis communication, media innovations, industry & government relations & advocacy, digital online platforms, and value-added services). We are passionately committed to understanding our clients and their customers - and deeply humbled by the enormous responsibility that comes with it.
name: Swamee Public Relations Consultancy

idea: To create indigenous based teaching learning laboratory products (devices, demonstration kits)/experimental models through research and development, which would make effectively to understand fundamental concepts. This would be useful to high school, colleges, undergraduate, post graduate and research scholar.
